messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] books to Australia
messages.msgSnippet: My Australia-residing aunt-in-law loves to receive Amazon.com gift certificates in US dollars because she gets much better deals that way.  I think they ship
messages.messageBody:
My Australia-residing aunt-in-law loves to receive Amazon.com gift
certificates in US dollars because she gets much better deals that way. I think they
ship from Australian warehouses, so postage isn't a big deal. Maybe someone
could buy you gift certificates and mail those for less than a buck. I also
think it's pretty easy to deposit a check from a foreign bank - so you could pay
this buyer back - if it's made out in US dollars, but I'm not positive about
that.

Pam T., dropping in for a quick second


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
